title: Will I get banned if I change the champion select music to the old one ?
body: I read somewhere that you can get banned for changing game files.

replies.body: We don't support modifying game files, or any issues that happen as a result.  We won't necessarily ban for this unless it causes an unfair advantage in-game, or if you download something with malicious content hiding within.  Your best bet is to review our[ third party guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/225266848), and simply stay safe!

Your (corporate, not personal) policy on third party programs has always seemed a bit unfair. It makes sense in terms of protecting yourselves from attempts to cheat, but I always felt like it should be safe enough to have a clear cut policy of "If we did not get the impression that this player was attempting to gain an unfair advantage in a match made game, we will limit any response to a warning not to use this program again". Still at your discretion, but people don't have to worry about accidentally breaking policy by using custom map skins or whatever.
